tool_description: Identifies and labels different speakers in audio segments, providing speaker separation and tracking for multi-speaker transcription scenarios.

audio_segment_id.description: Audio segment identifier for speaker analysis

min_speakers.description: Minimum number of speakers to detect (1-10)

max_speakers.description: Maximum number of speakers to detect (1-10)

error_messages: Invalid audio segment: Provide a valid audio_segment_id.
Invalid speaker count: min_speakers and max_speakers must be between 1-10, with min_speakers <= max_speakers.
Invalid threshold: speaker_change_threshold must be between 0.1-1.0.
Diarization failed: Unable to perform speaker diarization on the provided audio segment.
Insufficient audio: Audio segment too short for reliable speaker diarization.
usage: Provide audio_segment_id for speaker analysis. Configure speaker count limits and change detection sensitivity. Returns speaker labels and timing information.

speaker_segments.description: List of speaker segment identifiers with labels

dominant_speaker.description: Label of the speaker with most speaking time
